thread.title: Imelda Faderan
thread.title_full: The Interior Design Institute reviewed by Imelda Faderan

author: Imelda Faderan
title: Imelda Faderan
text: Whatever reason it is that brought you here, whether it may be a personal interest in design, a self enrichment decision or going through a career change, you are in for a great ride! Enjoy every minute, every lesson and every assignment and you will surely come out empowered and ready for anything!
